title: Jhin Skin
body: Can player actually do something and not purchase RP to get free skin like idk Jhin's one?

replies.body: You could try your lock in obtaining shards through Hextech loot.  You can grab mastery chests for champions that you own which contains items to unlock.  More info is also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps!
